snippet: Baseball has the power to amaze and inspire, but the cheats keep pulling the sport down. Melky Cabrera was barred for 50 games after testing positive for testosterone.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column on San Francisco Giants outfielder Melky Cabrera, the MVP of the All-Star Game, being suspended for 50 games after testing positive for testosterone, a banned substance; holds that baseball has the power to amaze and inspire, but the cheats keep pulling the sport down.
lead_paragraph: Baseball has the power to amaze and inspire, but the cheats keep pulling the sport down. Melky Cabrera was barred for 50 games after testing positive for testosterone.

headline.seo: Giants’ Melky Cabrera Suspended 50 Games for Doping
headline.main: Seeking an Edge, Then Falling Off the Cliff
headline.print_headline: Seeking an Edge, Then Falling Off the Cliff
